info.author: Mike Burr
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
``stepdad``'s purpose is to be able to round up and bring order to those many standalone python modules that maybe you
wrote or found on the web at some point and have kept a copy (or copies) ever sense.

Given just a single python file (module), ``stepdad`` will create an appropriate setup.py and other files if necessary.
All metadata is carefully tracked so that when it comes time to upgrade you just ...upgrade like you would any other
python module or package.
info.name: stepdad
info.summary: Automatically package those singleton modules that keep getting lost. Other organziational benifits.
info.html_description:
stepdad’s purpose is to be able to round up and bring order to those many standalone python modules that maybe you wrote or found on the web at some point and have kept a copy (or copies) ever sense.

Given just a single python file (module), stepdad will create an appropriate setup.py and other files if necessary. All metadata is carefully tracked so that when it comes time to upgrade you just …upgrade like you would any other python module or package.
